name: Elmer MITSTIFER et al., Appellants, v. OLD LYCOMING TOWNSHIP VOLUNTEER FIRE COMPANY, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Mitstifer v. Old Lycoming Township Volunteer Fire Co.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Elmer MITSTIFER et al., Appellants, v. OLD LYCOMING TOWNSHIP VOLUNTEER FIRE COMPANY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Patrick H. Fierro, Fierro & Miele, Williamsport, for appellants.
David Bahl, McCormick, Lynn, Reeder, Nichols & Sarno, Williamsport, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 457
Elmer MITSTIFER et al., Appellants, v. OLD LYCOMING TOWNSHIP VOLUNTEER FIRE COMPANY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 23, 1975.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
Patrick H. Fierro, Fierro & Miele, Williamsport, for appellants.
David Bahl, McCormick, Lynn, Reeder, Nichols & Sarno, Williamsport, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
